thread.section_title: Blurb Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blurb | www.blurb.com
thread.title: Katie D'Aiuto

author: Katie D'Aiuto
title: Katie D'Aiuto
text: I was between Blurb and another company to print my 2016 scrapbook. I have used the other company before, but I had heard great things about Blurb. I started creating the book in the other program, and it was a frustrating experience. I hopped over to Blurb, and I was delighted at how simple it was to put my pages together. A couple weeks later, the book arrived, and I am absolutely THRILLED with the quality. It is a gorgeous book, and it is very sturdy. I have no concerns that it won't hold up for many, many years. Can't wait to make more Blurb books!
